evidence.claim: DDN Consulting utilizes AWS for hosting and data management.
The company implements HIPAA compliance in its health tech solutions.
Integration patterns include REST APIs for interoperability with healthcare systems.
DDN provides solutions adhering to FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Support for X12 EDI transactions in healthcare billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data exchange with a focus on X12, aligning with API automation.
